Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.ChessBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChessInterface

    public class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChessInterface
    Constructor for the ChessBoard class, establishes initial layout and the location of pieces on the board.
    Version:
    October 19th, 2017
    Author:
    Tyler Solnikowski, Kanoa Ellis, Kayla Davis
